## Normal Normal

```{r}
set.seed(1)

x <- rnorm(1000, 0, 1)

nn_lik <- nn_likelihood(x)
nn_p <- nn_prior()
nn_prop <- nn_proposal(.5, .5)
nn_prop_d <- nn_prop_density()

nn_samples <- metropolis_hastings(c(2, .5), nn_prop, 10000, 
                                  nn_lik, nn_p, nn_prop_d) 

plot(nn_samples[,1])
```
